constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 3 (Tuesday, January 5, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. SIRES:
H.R. 213.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Pursuant to clause 3(d)(1) of rule XIII of the Rules of the
House of Representatives, the Committee find the authority
for this legislation in article 1, Section 8 of the
Constitution.
[Page H74]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

title: Local Solutions to End Homelessness Act of 2021
